entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
